metadata.description:
It is a time before THE SIXTH GUN. Yet, the darkness and corruption that precede the coming of The Six are in their season.

The Crossroads is broken. A door to the Spirit World is ajar. And what has slipped through threatens all of creation. It is up to the reclusive witch, Buzzard Wife, to gather the tribes and form a Hunting Party. With the help of the legendary White Wolf, she will lead this elite group of shamans, scouts and warriors into battle. Into legend. Into the Valley of Death.
metadata.name: The Sixth Gun: Valley of Death
